pullRequest.title: LdapFacade to verify LDAP servers
pullRequest.bodyText:
With this change LdapFacade will check the LDAP servers before using them, namely it will check:

hostname resolves to IP address
connect succeeds to the TCP port matching the protocol on all the IP addresses for given hostname

commit.message:
check reachability of all LDAP servers

fixes #3196

nodes.bodyText: gotcha: cannot use java.net.URL since it does not recognize schemes other than http/https.
There is no reasonable way to get the functionality of getservbyname() libc library call: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3645405/get-port-number-for-service-name

InetAddress.isReachable() is not really useful as it either uses ICMP echo or TCP echo service. The former is not usable out of the box on Linux due to limited privileges, the latter is useless in this case as we are interested in other ports (and the TCP echo service is very little used these days anyway, if at all).
Any way to make reliable or at least to await a finite time. E.g. what if new ServerSocket throws, and latch is never decremented.
Could getAddresses() be empty, and would true be correct then?
